docs.snippet: Kenyans swept the men’s 3,000-meter steeplechase at the world track and field championships on Monday, but allegations of doping are said to be taking a toll on national pride....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kenyans swept the men’s 3,000-meter steeplechase at the world track and field championships on Monday, but allegations of doping are said to be taking a toll on national pride.
docs.abstract: Christopher Clarey On Global Sports column notes that epidemic of doping among Kenyan runners has hurt country's credibility in sport as well as national pride; urges Kenyan officials to protect country's legacy of international track and field champions by establishing rigorous testing programs.

headline.main: Atop Medal Table at Worlds, Kenya Is Also Under a Cloud
headline.print_headline: Atop Medal Table at Worlds, Kenya Is Also Under a Cloud

docs.snippet: A surge in migrants, many of them refugees from Syria, hit Hungary's southern border on Tuesday, passing through gaps in an unfinished barrier to a Europe groping for answers to its worst refugee crisis since World War Two....
docs.lead_paragraph: A surge in migrants, many of them refugees from Syria, hit Hungary's southern border on Tuesday, passing through gaps in an unfinished barrier to a Europe groping for answers to its worst refugee crisis since World War Two.

headline.main: 'The Wave Has Reached Us'-EU Gropes for Answers to Migrant Surge
headline.print_headline: 'The Wave Has Reached Us'-EU Gropes for Answers to Migrant Surge

docs.snippet: BRUMBERG--Peter, 86, beloved husband of Barbara and devoted father of Richard (Aija) and Gary (Wendy) and four grandchildren. Esteemed friend. He served in the US Navy; RPI '51, MgtE, Vice President Felton International. Enjoyed RV Travels, Sports...
docs.lead_paragraph: BRUMBERG--Peter, 86, beloved husband of Barbara and devoted father of Richard (Aija) and Gary (Wendy) and four grandchildren. Esteemed friend. He served in the US Navy; RPI '51, MgtE, Vice President Felton International. Enjoyed RV Travels, Sports, Music and Bridge. Service Today at Gutterman's Inc., Rockville Centre, NY at 11am. All deeply mourn his passing. 1/3

headline.main: Ranieri Backs Leicester's Vardy for England Call Up
headline.print_headline: Ranieri Backs Leicester's Vardy for England Call Up
